title: Feta, olive and sun-dried tomato spread
ingredients: ['1 (200g) packet feta cheese, crumbled', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '1 clove garlic, minced', '50g (2 oz) sun-dried tomatoes, softened', '1/2 teaspoon dried oregano', 'handful Greek black olives, pitted and chopped']
